name: .filter
description: Construct a new instance from current elements that pass the provided test or match the provided selector or element(s)

arguments.name: comparisonFunction
arguments.description: A function that will be passed the element and its index, in that order. Return `true` to add it to the returned instance, otherwise it won't be.

arguments.name: comparison
arguments.description: The selector or element(s) to compare descendants to. If it's an array-like or zQuery object, only one element in the object must match for it to count as a match.

returns: A new zQuery instance containing the filtered elements
